summary: The Methane Reduction and Economic Growth Act (S.2304) amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a tax credit for capturing methane from mining activities. This incentivizes the use of methane capture equipment at mines (underground, abandoned, surface) by providing a credit based on the amount of qualified methane captured and used for energy or injection. The bill defines qualified methane, methane capture equipment, and qualified facilities, with an effective date of January 1, 2025.
